snippet: The All-Star Game is over, a few more days off await before play resumes and what's commonly called the second half of the NBA season is about to begin....
lead_paragraph: The All-Star Game is over, a few more days off await before play resumes and what's commonly called the second half of the NBA season is about to begin.

headline.main: The 'Second Half' of NBA Season Awaits With Playoff Intrigue
headline.print_headline: The 'Second Half' of NBA Season Awaits With Playoff Intrigue
